rules.description: No class has more than 300 lines of code.
rules.cypherQuery:
MATCH
  (c:Class)
WHERE
  c.effectiveLineCount >= 300
RETURN
  c.fqn as FQN, c.effectiveLineCount as `Lines of Code`
ORDER BY
  c.effectiveLineCount DESC

rules.description: No method has a higher cyclomatic complexity than 10.
rules.cypherQuery:
MATCH
  (m:Method)
WHERE
  m.cyclomaticComplexity > 10
RETURN
  m.fqn as FQN, m.cyclomaticComplexity as `Cyclomatic Complexity`
ORDER BY
  m.cyclomaticComplexity DESC
